message.content:
1. The aim was to compare two things.
2. The comparison was between bimatoprost 0.03% and brimonidine 0.2%.
3. The comparison was in terms of efficacy.
4. The comparison was also in terms of cost-effectiveness.
5. The comparison was related to primary open-angle glaucoma (POAG).
6. The comparison was also related to ocular hypertension (OHT).

messages.content:
Statement: The aim was to compare efficacy and cost-effectiveness of bimatoprost 0.03% and brimonidine 0.2% in primary open-angle glaucoma (POAG)/ocular hypertension (OHT).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
